name: Tether (itch) (What Guns Are What Do)
description:
Our first Jam Game! This game was created for Ludum Dare 30 in 72 hours by a bunch of friends in Bill's apartment, kicking off a grand tradition. Please excuse the HTML buttons and the Alert message that displays when you win: this is a very old game and we were still learning the ropes. Despite its faults, we think this game has a wonderful atmosphere and is still enjoyable to play.

SpaceHold to Launch the ShipZXCVWinch in the Tether cable+ / -Zoom the camera in and out

Tether was created by:

  • Chris (lead developer, designer)
  • Bill (developer)
  • Ryan (audio)
  • Miki (art)
